title: GitHub Docs Supply Chain Analysis
description: Analyzed GitHub Actions and npm dependencies in github/docs repo. All external actions are official GitHub-owned with recent updates. npm dependencies appear up-to-date with Express 5.x and latest lodash. No immediate takeover risks identified.
recommendation: Monitor Sharp library usage for any custom implementations. Consider expanding analysis to other high-value GitHub repositories.

title: Shopify App Dependency Chain Vulnerabilities
description: Identified multiple high-risk vectors in Shopify app ecosystem including deprecated Oberlo app still installed on 100k+ stores, jQuery < 3.5.0 in Privy and other apps, potential CDN subdomain takeovers, and shared analytics libraries creating cross-store data exposure risks.
impact: High - Potential mass exploitation across thousands of stores
recommendation: Prioritize jQuery XSS research in Privy app, investigate Oberlo deprecated endpoints, check CDN CNAME records for takeover opportunities. Estimated bounty: $10k-30k for mass XSS.
